page.title: 10Community life
page.content:
These are the views expressed by Mrs. Sage during an interview with her.
In the past there was more{community {life.}People lived, worked and shopped in the village. This has declined due to the many{commuters}but there is still a good{community spirit.}I accept the fact that people want to move out into the country and although some are not interested in{village {life}many are. I think people have an obligation to support the village in which they live. { { I think the "values" have gone. In the past people where more conscientious and had a better sense of right and wrong.
